attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The time has come for the government to form into a coalition for the following reasons 1.to produce the policies that can make us a zero carbon country and show the world it can be done, 2. save your job!! back to 1. No party will do this as a party as they will lose to many votes. this will have to be done for the good of the people and plant. In the long term we would become leaders to this great world again! redical thinking and hardship to society has to come to 1 and all to make this work. it can not work with party politics as they stand now.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
